creator: n.nicolson@kew.org
text:
CSV delimited files can contain commas in data as long as the field is quoted.
The CSVRead function interprets the comma in the field data as a field separator.

Yes, that is a current restriction; the function does not support all CSV file 
formats; this is really a documentation bug...

It is possible to change the delimiter by setting the property 
csvread.delimiter.

It's not trivial to support the full range of CSV formats.
creator: sebb@apache.org
